#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int ar[100];
int main(){
    int t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int s = 0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i+=1){
            scanf("%d",&ar[i]);
            s += ar[i];
        }
        int val = n*(n-1)/2;
        int rem = (s-val);
        if(rem%n==0){
            int ans = 0;
            int div = rem/n;
            for(int i=0;i<n;i+=1)
                if(ar[i]>(div+i))
                    ans += (ar[i]-div-i);
            printf("%d\n",ans);
        }
        else printf("-1\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
